New Records: The Astros tied a record with their fifth no-hit bid of at least seven innings in a season.
Key Match Events: Jose Altuve hit a game-winning double in the bottom of the ninth inning.
Paul DeJong hit a two-run homer in the top of the ninth inning.
Framber Valdez pitched seven no-hit innings.
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Joe Espada praised Framber Valdez's performance and the team's resilience.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was the Astros' sixth walk-off win of the season.
